commit.message: Fixed give more items when using fortune pickaxe

nodes.bodyText:
Adding the items to the inventory directly is a really bad idea.
Just drop them in the world if you really wanna do it that way...
But this will cause problems with full inventories and would be a very inconsistent behaviour.
